instructions:
In a covered 4 quart pot, simmer ham hocks in water along with spices for 2 1/2 hours. Discard bay leaf
and onion with cloves. Remove skin and bones from hocks and discard. Return to broth, meat cut to bite
size, carrots and onion pieces and simmer for 5 minutes. Add beans and simmer for about 20 minutes or until
all vegetables are done. Serve with salt-water potatoes. Serves 8. 
*(Rev. 8/8/96)*
ingredients: 4 medium onions quartered then halved and separated
2 carrots, cut in thirds and quartered
name: Ham Hocks And Green Beans
creator: Mary & Jim Decker
